prompts.prompt: List all channels for the team {teamName}. Show each channel's description and whether it is private or standard.

template.name: list-team-channels
template.description: Lists all channels in a specified Microsoft Teams team, showing descriptions and privacy types.

arguments.name: teamName
arguments.description: The display name of the Microsoft Teams team.

prompts.prompt: Send the following message to the {channelName} channel in the {teamName} team: {message}.

template.name: send-team-channel-message
template.description: Sends a message to a specific channel within a specified team.

arguments.name: teamName
arguments.description: The display name of the Microsoft Teams team.

arguments.name: channelName
arguments.description: The display name of the channel within the team.

prompts.prompt: List all Microsoft Teams teams I am a member of, including each team's description and number of members.

template.name: list-joined-teams
template.description: Lists all Microsoft Teams teams the user has joined, including descriptions and member counts.
